h2.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(34, 110, 147); text-decoration-line: inherit; line-height: 1.4; padding-top: 0px; pointer-events: none; white-space: pre-wrap; padding-left: 0px; text-align: center;

h5.style: box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; max-width: 100%; pointer-events: all; position: relative;

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(34, 110, 147); text-decoration-line: inherit; line-height: 1.4; padding-top: 0px; pointer-events: none; white-space: pre-wrap; padding-left: 0px; text-align: center;

span.span: To provide accurate, current, and helpful information
, The Argyle Central School District has created this page as a centralized resource for our community in response to COVID-19. As we begin to navigate through the unprecedented school closure

that our community is enduring, we would like to first and foremost thank each and every one of you in the Argyle Central School District for your patience and understanding during this time. Please use the information on this page as your source for reliable and accurate information. To simplify lines of communication during the school closure, the district has also created a centralized point of contact for questions and concerns.

h4.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(34, 110, 147); text-decoration-line: inherit; line-height: 1.4; padding-top: 0px; pointer-events: none; white-space: pre-wrap; padding-left: 0px; text-align: center;

strong.br: Please email info@argylecsd.org and we will respond to you promptly.

span.br: As always, please feel free to call our main office as well for any needs, but be mindful that we have lowered the number of staff members/ working hours to accommodate a healthy workforce occupancy and may not be able to answer calls immediately.

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; max-width: 100%; pointer-events: all; position: relative;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(99, 36, 35);
